page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT (continued)
page.content:
..of people interviewed said that they get on well with their employer and 77% said they liked their job. The highest unemployment is in the 26-35 female group-95% unemployed. The lowest unemployment being in the 26-35 male group - 50% unemployed. When asked which jobs unemployed people would like to do, the most popular jobs were manual or service jobs,showing that people's aspirations are regulated by the prospects within the area. However,a minority of people still looked further for jobs such as designers or in the armed services, showing that ambition is still alive in Speke.
Written by the children of St.Christophers School,Speke.
